title: riot kayle
body:
im not clear on how this works but i got kayle, from riot, but i didnt get her skin though. i thought when i read the post it said, "if you don't own kayle, you'll get her too." so im unsure if im waiting a couple more days for the skin or i only get kayle from this.

thanks, sorry if this is in wrong board

replies.body: The system can only do one thing at a time. So they need to give everyone Kayle first, then give everyone Riot Kayle, then give out the icon, and then move on to the mystery gift stuff. {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Yeah the same thing happened to me but i wouldn't be too worried about it trust in riot they always have the player's best interest in heart and will pull through in the end

The content for the 10-year anniversary is going out over the next few weeks. If you don't have it by the 23rd of this month, let me know.

Our official post on this can be found [here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you) Let me know if you have any questions.
